Title: Requires manufacturers to provide access to motor vehicle data to motor vehicle owners and designees
Summary: Requires manufacturers to provide access to motor vehicle data to motor vehicle owners and designees; provides certain exceptions; repeals upon enactment of similar federal legislation.
LawCode: Add ยง198-d, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to access to motor vehicle data by the owner or designee of a motor vehicle
